seo.title: Services - Christos Portfolio
seo.description: Discover the professional services offered by Christos Tsopelas, including frontend, backend, and API development.
seo.keywords: Services, Web Development, Frontend, Backend, API Development, Testing, Performance
seo.author: Christos Tsopelas

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Crafting fast, responsive, and accessible user interfaces using modern libraries and frameworks.
frontend.moreInfo: With experience in React, Vue, and Angular, I turn designs and wireframes into functional, accessible web applications, ensuring a consistent user experience across devices.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: Building reliable backend systems using JavaScript frameworks like Node.js and Express.
backend.moreInfo: I focus on creating efficient and scalable backend systems with REST APIs, MVC architecture, and SQL/NoSQL databases such as MongoDB and PostgreSQL, ensuring seamless integration with frontend systems.

api.title: API Design & Integration
api.description: Designing secure REST APIs and connecting to services like CMSs and databases.
api.moreInfo: I design and implement secure APIs and integrate them with systems like Contentful and Firebase, making data connections efficient. I also connect APIs to the frontend to ensure smooth communication.

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.description: Boosting page performance using techniques like dynamic imports and caching.
performance.moreInfo: Using tools like Lighthouse, I focus on improving website loading times, SEO performance, and usability, implementing techniques like lazy loading, image compression, and code splitting.

components.title: Component Libraries & Design Systems
components.description: Building UI libraries with tools like Storybook for scalable and reusable components.
components.moreInfo: I help clients create consistent design systems and reusable component libraries for efficient development, testing, and documentation of UI elements in isolation.

testing.title: Testing & Deployment Automation
testing.description: Ensuring code quality with testing and automating deployments with CI/CD pipelines.
testing.moreInfo: Using tools like Jest and React Testing Library, I write robust unit and integration tests. I also automate build, test, and deployment pipelines with tools like GitHub Actions or Docker.
